verses.verse: Israel <S%H3478><s%> is a luxuriant <S%H1238><s%> vine <S%H1612><s%>, that putteth forth <S%H7737><s%> his fruit <S%H6529><s%>: according to the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of his fruit <S%H6529><s%> he hath multiplied <S%H7235><s%> his altars <S%H4196><s%>; according to the goodness <S%H2896><s%> of their land <S%H776><s%> they have made goodly <S%H2895><s%> pillars <S%H4676><s%>.

Their heart <S%H3820><s%> is divided <S%H2505><s%>; now shall they be found guilty <S%H816><s%>: he will smite <S%H6202><s%> their altars <S%H4196><s%>, he will destroy <S%H7703><s%> their pillars <S%H4676><s%>.
Surely now shall they say <S%H559><s%>, We have no king <S%H4428><s%>; for we fear <S%H3372><s%> not Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and the king <S%H4428><s%>, what can he do for us <S%H6213><s%>?

They speak <S%H1696><s%> vain words <S%H1697><s%>, swearing <S%H422><s%> falsely <S%H7723><s%> in making <S%H3772><s%> covenants <S%H1285><s%>: therefore judgment <S%H4941><s%> springeth up <S%H6524><s%> as hemlock <S%H7219><s%> in the furrows <S%H8525><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>.

The inhabitants <S%H7934><s%> of Samaria <S%H8111><s%> shall be in terror <S%H1481><s%> for the calves <S%H5697><s%> of Beth-aven <S%H1007><s%>; for the people <S%H5971><s%> thereof shall mourn <S%H56><s%> over it <S%H3649><s%>, and the priests thereof that rejoiced <S%H1523><s%> over it <S%H3519><s%>, for the glory thereof <S%H1540><s%>, because it is departed from it.

It also shall be carried <S%H2986><s%> unto Assyria <S%H804><s%> for a present <S%H4503><s%> to king <S%H4428><s%> Jareb <S%H3377><s%>: Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall receive <S%H3947><s%> shame <S%H1317><s%>, and Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be ashamed <S%H954><s%> of his own counsel <S%H6098><s%>.
As for Samaria <S%H8111><s%>, her king <S%H4428><s%> is cut off <S%H1820><s%>, as foam <S%H7110><s%> upon <S%H6440><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%>.

The high places <S%H1116><s%> also of Aven <S%H206><s%>, the sin <S%H2403><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, shall be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>: the thorn <S%H6975><s%> and the thistle <S%H1863><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> on their altars <S%H4196><s%>; and they shall say <S%H559><s%> to the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, Cover <S%H3680><s%> us <S%H1389><s%>; and to the hills, Fall on us <S%H5307><s%>.

O Israel <S%H3478><s%>, thou hast sinned <S%H2398><s%> from the days <S%H3117><s%> of Gibeah <S%H1390><s%>: there they stood <S%H5975><s%>; the battle <S%H4421><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of iniquity <S%H5932><s%> doth not overtake <S%H5381><s%> them in Gibeah <S%H1390><s%>.

When it is my desire <S%H185><s%>, I will chastise <S%H3256><s%> them <S%H5971><s%>; and the peoples shall be gathered <S%H622><s%> against them <S%H631><s%>, when they are bound to their two <S%H8147><s%> transgressions <S%H5869><s%>.

And Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is a heifer <S%H5697><s%> that is taught <S%H3925><s%>, that loveth <S%H157><s%> to tread out <S%H1758><s%> the grain <S%H5674><s%>; but I have passed over upon her fair <S%H2898><s%> neck <S%H6677><s%>: I will set a rider <S%H7392><s%> on Ephraim <S%H669><s%>; Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall plow <S%H2790><s%>, Jacob <S%H3290><s%> shall break his clods <S%H7702><s%>.

Sow <S%H2232><s%> to yourselves in <S%H6310><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, reap <S%H7114><s%> according to kindness <S%H2617><s%>; break up <S%H5214><s%> your fallow ground <S%H5215><s%>; for it is time <S%H6256><s%> to seek <S%H1875><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, till he come <S%H935><s%> and rain <S%H3384><s%> righteousness upon you <S%H6664><s%>.

Ye have plowed <S%H2790><s%> wickedness <S%H7562><s%>, ye have reaped <S%H7114><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>; ye have eaten <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of lies <S%H3585><s%>; for thou didst trust <S%H982><s%> in thy way <S%H1870><s%>, in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of thy mighty men <S%H1368><s%>.

Therefore shall a tumult <S%H7588><s%> arise <S%H6965><s%> among thy people <S%H5971><s%>, and all thy fortresses <S%H4013><s%> shall be destroyed <S%H7703><s%>, as Shalman <S%H8020><s%> destroyed <S%H7701><s%> Beth-arbel <S%H1009><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle <S%H4421><s%>: the mother <S%H517><s%> was dashed in pieces <S%H7376><s%> with her children <S%H1121><s%>.

So <S%H3602><s%> shall Beth-el <S%H1008><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> unto you because <S%H6440><s%> of your great <S%H7451><s%> wickedness <S%H7451><s%>: at daybreak <S%H7837><s%> shall the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> be utterly <S%H1820><s%> cut off <S%H1820><s%>.
